text:
Although MediaMobz respects the privacy of all those who visit the Site and use our online services, we do collect information from our members and visitors.
Our policy is to release the data we collect in the following circumstances: For abusive users, we may release information to assist in attempting to block the abusive user or to file a complaint with that user's Internet Service Provider.
The web servers that host this Site maintain access logs with the information that you send.
The data logged may be used by us to solve technical problems with the Site and, in cases of abuse of this Site, to investigate the abuse.

The Service stores personal and media data collected and input by users for specified, explicit, and legitimate purposes and kept for no longer than necessary for the purposes of processing.
The Service stores this media and personal identifiable information data on behalf of users as long as necessary for the purposes for which it was originally collected.

data_type: personal information user submit to we through site
text: We collect personal information that users submit to us voluntarily through the Site.
Upon deletion of media and an account, no user-owned media or user account personal identifiable information is retained by the Service.
User media and user account content is stored securely by the Service in the USA on Amazon Web Services (AWS) infrastructure and data processing equipment.
